blackmail when meeting a lover through

Tay Ninh police received
this case. Late last year, a young woman named K
became friends with a Facebook account named K.
This successful girl revealed a sensitive video after
video chats, then
this account blocked her. At this time,
another Facebook account befriended her and asked

Similarly, D also made friends on Facebook named Hang
Ni while texting and dating,
also revealing sensitive photos that were filmed and photographed by this person,
then Hang Ni threatened to send them
to her friends.  If D did not transfer money because he was afraid,
D transferred 8 million VND to the
bank account provided. The subject
continued to request to transfer 20 million VND. D
went to the police to report the above two incidents.
The police advised people to  Be
careful when chatting online.
Verify your identity and personal information,

February 9, an explosion believed to be caused by
homemade fireworks occurred in Duc Pho Town,
Quang Ngai Province and left one person
dead and two others in the same family
seriously injured.
According to initial information  The explosion occurred at
about 11 p.m. when Mr. Pham Van An, born in
1976, and his biological child made a
homemade firecracker behind the kitchen of Mr. An's house, his wife Mai refused to
answer and the child was seriously injured and was taken
to the hospital for emergency treatment.  An died
on the way to rescue at the scene.
Authorities noted that there were a lot of
materials scattered from the explosion and some suspected
unused explosive powder. It was
known that An sold noodles in the city.
